title: Privacy Policy

text-9: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and we hold certain information.
text-10: Cookies are files with a small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier.
text-11: Cookies are sent to your browser from a website and stored on your device. Other tracking
text-11-1: technologies are also used such as beacons, tags and scripts to collect and track information and to

text-12-1: However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Service.
